short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Year on the Power Platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Dashboard on your year in the Power Platform.
Pulls key data from the all your Power Platform environments, covering 
Flows, Canvas Apps, Agents, Connection References.

Allows you to download list of all of the above in a csv or json format

Check out blog explaining how it works here https://dev.to/wyattdave/my-power-platform-your-year-in-a-dashboard-3m04
